Package org.gsma.joyn.messaging Description

This API permits to offer chat (one-to-one chat and group chat) and file transfer services.

The chat service supports: Delivery report (“message has been delivered”, “message has been displayed”). Is-composing features. Add one or several participants to the current conversation. Conference event monitoring (“someone has joined the session”, “someone has left the session”). Rejoin an existing group chat session.
